{"version":"5.66","themeCollection":{"baseTheme":{"name":"CY24SU10","type":2,"version":{"visual":"1.8.97","report":"2.0.97","page":"1.3.97"}},"customTheme":{"name":"AccessibleTidal","type":2,"version":{"visual":"1.8.97","report":"2.0.97","page":"1.3.97"}}},"activeSectionIndex":0,"modelExtensions":[{"name":"extension","entities":[{"name":"Report_Payment_Vs_Due","extends":"Report_Payment_Vs_Due","measures":[{"name":"AvgDelay_per_Invoice","dataType":3,"expression":"
AVERAGEX(
    SUMMARIZE(
        'Report_Payment_Vs_Due',
        'Report_Payment_Vs_Due'[Inv_InvoiceID],
        "DelayPerInvoice", AVERAGE('Report_Payment_Vs_Due'[Inv_ReceivingDelayDays])
    ),
    [DelayPerInvoice]
)","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}},{"name":"TotalDelayDays","dataType":3,"expression":"
SUMX(
    SUMMARIZE(
        'Report_Payment_Vs_Due',
        'Report_Payment_Vs_Due'[Inv_InvoiceID],
        "DelayDays", AVERAGE('Report_Payment_Vs_Due'[Inv_ReceivingDelayDays])
    ),
    [DelayDays]
)","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}}]},{"name":"Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering","extends":"Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering","measures":[{"name":"TotalUpliftVol_UCT","dataType":3,"expression":"
VAR SelectedWeekKey = MAX('Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[WeekKey])
RETURN
CALCULATE(
    SUMX(
        VALUES('Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[AF_flightID]),
        AVERAGE('Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[AF_UpliftVol])
    ),
    'Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[WeekKey] = SelectedWeekKey
)

","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}},{"name":"TotalUpliftVol_UCT_UntilLastWeek","dataType":3,"expression":"
VAR SelectedWeekKey = MAX('Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[WeekKey])
VAR PrevWeekKey =
    CALCULATE(
        MAX('Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[WeekKey]),
        REMOVEFILTERS('Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[WeeksLabel]),
        'Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[WeekKey] < SelectedWeekKey
    )
RETURN
IF(
    ISBLANK(PrevWeekKey),
    0,
    CALCULATE(
        SUMX(
            VALUES('Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[AF_flightID]),
            AVERAGE('Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[AF_UpliftVol])
        ),
        'Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[WeekKey] = PrevWeekKey,
        REMOVEFILTERS('Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[WeeksLabel])
    )
)

","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}},{"name":"Difference_from_last_week","dataType":3,"expression":"[TotalUpliftVol_UCT]-[TotalUpliftVol_UCT_UntilLastWeek]","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"references":{"unrecognizedReferences":false,"measures":[{"schema":"extension","entity":"Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering","name":"TotalUpliftVol_UCT"},{"schema":"extension","entity":"Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering","name":"TotalUpliftVol_UCT_UntilLastWeek"}]},"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}},{"name":"Total Uplift by Type & Leg","dataType":3,"expression":"

SUMX (
    VALUES ( avg_uplift_aircrafttype_leg[AF_AircraftType] ),
    SUMX (
        VALUES ( avg_uplift_aircrafttype_leg[AF_Leg] ),
        SUMX (
            FILTER (
                Flight_Avg,
                Flight_Avg[AircraftType] = MAX(YourTable[AircraftType]) &&
                Flight_Avg[Leg] = MAX(YourTable[Leg])
            ),
            Flight_Avg[AvgUplift]
        )
    )
)

","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"references":{"unrecognizedReferences":true},"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}},{"name":"Avg Uplift per Flight","dataType":3,"expression":"
CALCULATE (
    AVERAGE ( Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering[AF_UpliftVol] ),
    ALLEXCEPT ( Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering, Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering[AF_FlightId] )
)","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}},{"name":"Rank AircraftTypeLeg","dataType":3,"expression":"
RANKX (
    ALLSELECTED (
        'Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[AF_AircraftType],
        'Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[AF_Leg]
    ),
    [TotalUpliftVol_UCT],
    ,
    DESC,
    DENSE
)","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"references":{"unrecognizedReferences":false,"measures":[{"schema":"extension","entity":"Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering","name":"TotalUpliftVol_UCT"}]},"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}},{"name":"Rank_lastweek_uplift_Difference","dataType":3,"expression":"
RANKX(
    ALLSELECTED(
        'Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[AF_AircraftType],
        'Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering'[AF_Leg]
    ),
    [Difference_from_last_week],
    ,
    DESC,
    DENSE
)","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"references":{"unrecognizedReferences":false,"measures":[{"schema":"extension","entity":"Report_Uplift_Consumption_Tankering","name":"Difference_from_last_week"}]},"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}}]}]}],"bookmarks":[{"displayName":"Bookmark 1","name":"23766005f02486f2c37a","explorationState":{"version":"1.3","activeSection":"c2a246aaeda50ba2d7a4","sections":{"c2a246aaeda50ba2d7a4":{"visualContainers":{}}},"objects":{"merge":{"outspacePane":[{"properties":{"expanded":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"false"}}}}}]}}},"options":{"targetVisualNames":["f3976e6ffb621068eb94"],"suppressData":false,"applyOnlyToTargetVisuals":true}},{"displayName":"Bookmark 2","name":"70dd0dc414ca909c8633","explorationState":{"version":"1.3","activeSection":"c2a246aaeda50ba2d7a4","sections":{"c2a246aaeda50ba2d7a4":{"visualContainers":{}}},"objects":{"merge":{"outspacePane":[{"properties":{"expanded":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"false"}}}}}]}}},"options":{"targetVisualNames":["f31ff9b8c6cbf8aa2ace"],"applyOnlyToTargetVisuals":true,"suppressData":true}}],"defaultDrillFilterOtherVisuals":true,"linguisticSchemaSyncVersion":0,"settings":{"useNewFilterPaneExperience":true,"allowChangeFilterTypes":true,"useStylableVisualContainerHeader":true,"queryLimitOption":6,"useEnhancedTooltips":true,"exportDataMode":1,"useDefaultAggregateDisplayName":true,"filterPaneHiddenInEditMode":false},"objects":{"section":[{"properties":{"verticalAlignment":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"'Top'"}}}}}],"outspacePane":[{"properties":{"expanded":{"expr":{"Literal":{"Value":"false"}}}}}]}}
